item.title: Zotero Libreoffice Integration No Icons
item.description: Having spent half an hour trying to get the Zotero integration in LibreOffice to work (getting LibreOffice to detect Java needed the libreoffice-java-common package by the way), the toolbar appeared and worked, but without icons. Getting the icons to work required the following: First, close LibreOffice. Second, run the following commands: rm -r ~/.config/libreoffice/4/user/temp/ rm -r ~/.config/libreoffice/4/user/extensions/ Now after starting LibreOffice, you should see the icons instead of just words for each button on the Zotero toolbar.
